name: Golem
flavorText:
Its boulder-like
body is extremely
hard. It can easily withstand
dynamite blasts
without damage.

previous.name: Graveler
previous.flavorText:
Rolls down slopes
to move. It rolls
over any obstacle without slowing
or changing its
direction.

next.name: Ponyta
next.flavorText:
Its hooves are 10
times harder than
diamonds. It can trample anything
completely flat
in little time.

pokemon.name: Geodude
pokemon.flavorText:
Found in fields
and mountains.
Mistaking them for boulders,
people often step
or trip on them.

pokemon.name: Graveler
pokemon.flavorText:
Rolls down slopes
to move. It rolls
over any obstacle without slowing
or changing its
direction.
